name: Midget Car Rally - Free Dune Buggy Racing Game
name_original: Midget Car Rally - Free Dune Buggy Racing Game
description:
One of the Fast addictive racing game on AppStore!

Get ready for the off-road experience of your life with Midget Car Rally ! It will test your nerves and take you to the extremes off road driving capabilities. This game will test your balance skills and reaction times beyond belief.

You must use all of your Racing and dodging skills to reach the end of the Race . You’ll need quick reactions and nifty fingers, as there are many opposition players trying to take you down.Think you can dodge your way to the End Zone? Good,Fasten your seat belt, and let’s get running!
publishers: Al Khawarizmi Software Development and Services
